ssot__ConversationReasonReportDefinition.name: Conversation Reason Report Definition
ssot__ConversationReasonReportDefinition.description: The Conversation Reason Report Definition DMO represents an overview of the conversational data structure, including groups of conversation reasons and excerpts.

ssot__ConversationReasonRptStatus__c.description: The conversation reason status code for the report

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as the primary key for the conversation reason category DMO

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date the record was created

ssot__DateSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by the external record ID

ssot__DateSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connectorâ€™s external object

ssot__EndDateTime__c.description: The date and time the report ended

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the conversation reason report definition

ssot__Name__c.description: The name of the conversation reason report definition

ssot__PipelinerunId__c.description: A reference ID to the ML pipeline run identifier.

ssot__RecurringEventFrequencyUOM__c.description: The interval that the event reoccurs. Values include Secondly, Minutely, Hourly, Daily, Weekly, Monthly, Yearly, and No Refresh.

ssot__StartDateTime__c.description: The date and time the report started.
